00014 namespace SilverlightShowcase

00016     public partial class App : Application
00017     {
00018         public App()
00019         {
00020             this.Startup += this.Application_Startup;
00021             this.Exit += this.Application_Exit;
00022             this.UnhandledException += this.Application_UnhandledException;
00023 
00024             InitializeComponent();
00025         }
00026 
00027         private void Application_Startup(object sender, StartupEventArgs e)
00028         {
00029             IDictionary<String, String> parameters = e.InitParams;
00030             this.RootVisual = new MainPage(parameters);
00031         }
00032 
00033         private void Application_Exit(object sender, EventArgs e)
00034         {
00035 
00036         }
00037         private void Application_UnhandledException(object sender, ApplicationUnhandledExceptionEventArgs e)
00038         {
00039             // If the app is running outside of the debugger then report the exception using
00040             // the browser's exception mechanism. On IE this will display it a yellow alert 
00041             // icon in the status bar and Firefox will display a script error.
00042             if (!System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsAttached)
00043             {
00044 
00045                 // NOTE: This will allow the application to continue running after an exception has been thrown
00046                 // but not handled. 
00047                 // For production applications this error handling should be replaced with something that will 
00048                 // report the error to the website and stop the application.
00049                 e.Handled = true;
00050                 Deployment.Current.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(delegate { ReportErrorToDOM(e); });
00051             }
00052         }
00053         private void ReportErrorToDOM(ApplicationUnhandledExceptionEventArgs e)
00054         {
00055             try
00056             {
00057                 string errorMsg = e.ExceptionObject.Message + e.ExceptionObject.StackTrace;
00058                 errorMsg = errorMsg.Replace('"', '\'').Replace("\r\n", @"\n");
00059 
00060                 System.Windows.Browser.HtmlPage.Window.Eval("throw new Error(\"Unhandled Error in Silverlight Application " + errorMsg + "\");");
00061             }
00062             catch (Exception)
00063             {
00064             }
00065         }
00066     }
00067 }
